sourcesContent:
List of Flashcards({{viewTitle}} View)

Flashcard Id Name Description Image
{{ flashcard.FlashcardId }} {{ flashcard.Name }} {{ flashcard.Description }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flashcards-component', templateUrl: './flashcards.component.html', }) export class FlashcardsComponent { viewTitle: string = 'Table' flashcards: any[] = [ { "FlashcardId": 1, "Name": "Hus", "Description": "House", "ImageUrl": "assets/images/test.jpg" }, { "FlashcardId": 2, "Name": "Bil", "Description": "Car", "ImageUrl": "assets/images/random.jpg" } ]; }
